overview_of_class:
This is an applied design and analysis of experiments course. We will discuss how to analyze a variety of experiments: one-way and two-way layouts, incomplete block designs, factorial designs, random effects, split-plot and nested designs.

Homework will be assigned weekly or biweekly (about 7 assignments). There is one close-book midterm exam in class (calculator and one double-sided formula sheet are allowed) and one final group project.
name: Design and Analysis of Experiments
subject: STAT
